mapper.select: SELECT picture_address,commodity_name,commodity_code,commodity_first_picture,commodity_price,commodity_num,commodity_total_price FROM t_order_detail a join t_commodity b on a.commodity_id=b.commodity_id join t_commodity_pic c on b.commodity_id=c.commodity_id where a.order_id=#{orderId} order by b.sort_no
mapper.update: update t_order set order_state=#{orderState}, version=version+1, last_modified_by=#{lastModifiedBy}, gmt_modified=now() where order_id=#{orderNumber}
